chapter.text: M
DI tie NE est DI ESCEPT LI Viv DES ETERN
Li send vi this scripture truthfully konfirm all previous scriptures Li send down Torah Gospel
antaux ke, al direkt popol Li send statut libr! Those disbelieve di revelations incur severe retribution. DI est Almighty Avenger
Nothing kasx DI ter heaven
Li est Unu shapes vi wombs as Li vol. tie ne est ali di Him; Almighty Sagx

Li send vi this scripture containing straightforward vers - which constitute esenc scripture - Ankaux as multiple-meaning allegorical vers. Those haven dub their kor pursue multiple-meaning vers kre confusion extricate nepr meaning Neniom kon prav meaning thereof escept DI those put founded knowledge! Ili dir Ni kred en this - all da gxi ven our Lord Nur those posed intelligence pren heed
Our Lord let ne our kor waver nun ke Vi direkt us! Dusx us Your mercy; Vi est Grantor
Our Lord Vi surely gather popol tag est inevitable! DI NENIAM ROMP PROMES
Those disbelieve neniam help their mon nor their infan DI. Ili est fuel por Infer
Like Pharaoh's popol those them ili rejected our revelations consequently DI pun them their pek. DI est strict en enforcing retribution
Dir al those disbelieve Vi defeated tiam gathered Infer; ki miserable abode
Ekzempl set vi 2 arme clashed - 1 arme batal ig DI while ali disbelieving Ili seg their own okul ili est twice as many DI supports His victory whomever LI VOL. This proviz assurance those posed vizi
Ornam popol est worldly plezur such as women hav infan piles piles de or argxent dres cxeval livestock crops These est sxtof this mond. far put abode rezerv DI
Dir Let me inform vi de mult bon deal those plumb righteous life rezerv their Lord est gxarden flu streams pur spouses joy di blessings DI est Seer His worshipers
Ili dir Our Lord ni kred forgive us our pek sxpar us agondi hellfire
Ili est steadfast truthful submitting charitable kaj meditators je dawn
DI BOR witness tie NE est DI ESCEPT LI KAJ do ANGXEL those POSED knowledge! Truthfully equitably Li est absolut di; tie ne est di Li Almighty Sagx
Nur religi aprob per DI est Submission. Ironically those ricev scripture est unu disput this fakt knowledge ili ricev jealousy. Por such rejectors di revelations DI est strict en reckoning

Ili argue vi tiam dir mi simply submitted DI; mi those sekv me Vi proklam those ricev scripture tro as those who ne did Would vi submit? ili submit tiam ili direkt ili turn your pland misi est liver this message DI est Seer all POPOL
Those rejected di revelations killed prophets unjustly killed those advokat justice among des popol, promes them painful retribution
Their works nullified ambaux en this life Hereafter ili ne hav helpers
Vi not those est don part de scripture kiel ili invit uphold this scripture DI aplik gxi their own viv tiam kelk da them turn aversion
This because ili dir hellfire ne tusx us a few tag. Ili tiel tromp their religi their own fabrications
Kiel gxi do gxi por them when ni est summon them ke inevitable tag? Each anim est pag por whatever gxi earned malplej injustice

Dir Our di possessor all sovereignty! Vi grant sovereignty whomever Vi choose Vi remove sovereignty whomever Vi choose Vi grant dign whomever Vi choose commit al humiliation whomever Vi choose En Your man est all provisions Vi est Omnipotent
Vi merge nokt tag merge tag nokt. Vi produkt viv dead produkt dead el viv Vi proviz por whomever Vi choose lim
believers neniam ally disbelievers believers. Whoever does this ekzil DI! Exempted est those forced do this evit persecution! DI vigl VI KE VI reverence Him SOL. Al DI est ultimate destiny
Dir Whether vi conceal your innermost opini deklar gxi DI est fully aware thereof. Li est fully aware da cxio en heavens ter! DI est Omnipotent
Tag ven when each anim trov all bon works gxi done brought for! As por evil works gxi wish ke ili far far removed DI vigl VI KE VI reverence Him SOL. DI EST Compassionate towards POPOL
Proklam Se vi am DI vi sekv me DI testament tiam am vi forgive your pek! DI est Forgiver Merciful
Proklam Vi obe DI messenger ili turn DI ne am disbelievers
(DI chosen Adam Noah FAMILI Abraham FAMILI Amram messengers) AL POPOL
Ili aparten sam progeny. DI est Hearer Omniscient
wife Amram dir My Lord mi dedicx (beb) my belly Vi totally tial akcept me Vi est Hearer Omniscient
When sxi don nask al her sxi dir My Lord mi don nask girl - DI EST fully aware da KI SXI BOR - Vir ne est sam as female Mi nom her Mary mi invoke Your protection her her descendants el rejected diabl

Her Lord akcept her gracious acceptance brought her gracious upbringing guardianship Zachariah. Whenever Zachariah entered her sanctuary li trov provisions her. Li pet Mary did vi get this el? Sxi dir Gxi est DI. DI proviz por whomever LI chooses LIM
when Zachariah implored his Lord My Lord grant me such bon infan Vi est Hearer prayers
Angxel vok him when li pregx sanctuary DI don vi bon news de John believer vort DI honorable moral righteous prophet
Li dir Kiel can mi hav knab when mi est old my wife sterile Li dir DI does whatever Li vol
Li dir My Lord don me sign. Li dir Your sign est ti vi ne parol al popol 3 tag signal! Commemorate your Lord frequently; medit nokt tag
Angxel dir O Mary DI chosen vi purified vi. Li chosen vi all women
O Mary vi submit your Lord prostrate bow down those bow down
This est news preter ni reveal vi. Vi ne est tie when ili drew their raffles select Mary's guardian Vi ne est prezent when ili argued 1 another
Angxel dir O Mary DI don vi bon news Vort el Him nom est Messiah Jesus fil Mary. Li est prominent en this life Hereafter 1 de those closest al Me
Li parol al popol crib tro adult li est 1 de des righteous
Sxi dir My Lord kiel can mi hav fil when ne hom tusx me Li dir DI tiel kre whatever Li vol. Al hav anything done Li simply dir al Est ' gxi est
Li instru him scripture wisdom Torah Gospel

As messenger Infan Israel mi ven vi sign el your Lord - Mi kre vi el clay shape bird tiam mi blov gxi gxi igx viv bird di las. Mi restore vizi blind heal leprous mi revive dead di las! Mi tell vi ki vi mangx ki vi store your hejm. This est proof vi se vi est believers
Mi konfirm previous scripture - Torah - Mi revoke nepr prohibitions trud upon vi. Mi ven vi sufficient proof el your Lord Do vi observ DI obe me
DI est my Lord your Lord VI worship Him SOL! This est dekstr path
When Jesus sens their disbelief li dir Who est my supporters DI? discxipl dir Ni est di supporters; ni kred en DI bor witness ni est submitters
Our Lord ni hav kred en ki Vi send down ni sekv messenger; count us witnesses
Ili plotted schemed did DI DI est put schemer

Tiel DI dir O Jesus mi terminating your life raising vi al Me ridding vi de disbelievers! Mi exalt those sekv vi super those disbelieve Tag Resurrection. Tiam al Me est ultimate destiny de all da vi tiam mi jugx vi your disput
As por those disbelieve mi commit them painful retribution en this mond en Hereafter Ili ne hav helpers
As por those kred plumb righteous life Li fully recompense them! DI NE AM DES unjust
These est revelations ke ni recite vi proviz message plen de wisdom
Ekzempl Jesus DI koncern est sam as ke de Adam; Li kre him polv tiam dir al him Est li est
This est truth your Lord ne haven any dub
anyone argues vi knowledge vi ricev tiam dir Let us summon our infan your infan our women your women yourselves tiam let us invoke di curse liars
Absolutely this est narration truth. Absolutely tie ne est di escept DI! Absolutely DI est Almighty Sagx
Ili turn tiam DI est fully aware da evildoers
dir O followers scripture ven logical agreement us vi ke ni ne worship DI ni neniam set any idols Him nor set any human beings lords DI ili turn dir Bor witness ni est submitters
O followers scripture why vi argue Abraham when Torah Gospel ne revealed gxis post him? Vi ne kompren
Vi argued ajx vi hav kon; vi argue ajx vi ne kon? DI kon, while VI NE KON
Abraham est nek Jewish nor Christian li est monotheist submitter. Li neniam est idol worshiper
Popol worthy de Abraham est those sekv him this prophet those kred. DI est Lord MASTR DE believers
Kelk followers scripture wish plumb vi astray ili nur plumb astray sen perceiving
O followers scripture vi reject these revelations DI vi bor witness this est truth
O followers scripture why vi confound truth falsehood do conceal truth knowingly
Kelk followers scripture dir Kred en ki send down believers en des maten reject gxi en des vesper maybe someday ili revert

Ne kred escept as those sekv your religi. Dir prav guidance est di guidance. ili pretend ti ili hav sam guidance argue vi your Lord dir All grace est di man; Li bestows gxi whomever Li vol. DI est Bounteous Omniscient
Li specifies His mercy whomever Li vol; DI posed unlimited grace

Kelk followers scripture fid whole lot ili don gxi vi. Others them ne fid single dinar; ili ne repay vi vi keep them. Est ili dir Ni ne hav al est honest when dealing kun gentiles! Tiel ili atribu mensog DI knowingly
Ja those fulfill their obligations plumb righteous life DI am des righteous

As por those meti for di covenant their obligations cheap prez ili ricev ne akci Hereafter DI testament NE parol al them nor jen them TAG Resurrection nor VOL LI purify them! Ili incurred painful retribution
Among them est those tord their lang imit scripture vi opini est scripture when ne est scripture ili pretend gxi est DI when gxi ne est DI! Tiel ili utter mensog atribu them DI knowingly
Neniam would human est whom DI ben kun scripture prophethood dir al popol Idolize me DI. Instead (li dir) Devote absolutely your Lord sol scripture vi predik teachings vi lern
Nor would li komand vi idolize angxel prophets lords Li exhort vi Would disbelieve igx submitters

DI PREN covenant prophets dir MI DON VI scripture wisdom. Afterwards messenger ven konfirm all ekzist scriptures! Vi kred en him support him. Li dir Do vi agree this pledge fulfill this covenant Ili dir Ni agree Li dir Vi tiel bor witness mi bor witness vi
Those reject this (Quranic prophecy) est evil unu
Ili streb di religi when cxio en heavens ter submitted Him volont unwillingly kaj Him ili returned
dir Ni kred en DI en ki send us en ki send down Abraham Ismail Isaac Jacob Patriarchs en ki don Moses Jesus prophets their Lord Ni ne far distinction any da them. Al Him sol ni est submitters
Anyone akcept Submission his religi gxi ne akcept him Hereafter li est losers
Why DI direkt popol should disbelieved post kred post witnessing messenger est truth kaj solid proofs don them? DI NE DIREKT DES wicked
These incurred condemnation DI angxel all popol
Eternally ili abide therein; retribution neniam commuted them nor vol ili reprieved
Exempted est those who pent thereafter reform DI est Forgiver Merciful
Those disbelieve kred tiam plongx profund disbelief their repentance ne akcept them; ili est efektiv strayers
Those disbelieve mort disbelievers earthful or vol ne akcept any da them eben such ransom est possible Ili incurred painful retribution; ili ne hav helpers
Vi ne ating righteousness vi don charity possessions vi am. Whatever vi don charity DI est fully aware thereof
All food uz est lawful por Infan Israel Israel trud nepr prohibitions themselves antaux Torah send down dir Bring Torah leg gxi vi est truthful
Those fabricate false prohibitions this atribu them al DI est ver wicked
Dir DI proklam truth Vi sekv Abraham's religi! - monotheism. Li neniam est idolater
Plej grav shrine establ por popol est 1 Becca; ben beacon all popol
En est klar sign staci Abraham. Anyone enters gxi granted sekur passage Popol sxuld gxi DI ke ili observ Hajj this shrine when ili afford gxi! As por those disbelieve DI ne bezon anyone
Dir O followers scripture why vi reject these revelations DI when DI witnessing cxio vi est do
dir O followers scripture do vi repel path DI those wish kred streb distort gxi eben vi est witnesses DI est neniam unaware de anything vi do
O vi kred vi obe kelk da those who ricev scripture ili revert vi kred disbelievers
Kiel vi disbelieve when these revelations DI recited vi His messenger ven vi? Whoever ten fast DI testament direkt dekstr path
O vi kred vi observ DI as Li observ ne mort Submitters

Vi ten fast sxnur DI all da vi kaj ne divid! Recall di blessings vi! - Vi uz est enemies Li reconciled your kor. Per His grace vi igx brethren. Vi est brink pit de fajr Li sav vi therefrom DI TIEL EKSPLIK His revelations VI VI DIREKT
Let tie est community de vi invit al ki est bon advokat righteousness forbid evil These est winners
Ne est those igx divid disput klar proofs ke don them! Por these incurred terrible retribution
(Tag ven when kelk vizagx brightened joy while ali vizagx darkened mizer)! As por those vizagx darkened ili pet vi est ne disbelieve post kred? Do sufer retribution your disbelief
As por those vizagx brightened ili gxoj di mercy; ili abide therein forever
These est di revelations; ni recite them vi truthfully. DI NE wish any hardship POPOL
Di aparten cxio heavens cxio ter all materi controlled DI
Vi est bon community ever raised among des popol vi advokat righteousness forbid evil vi kred en DI! followers scripture kred gxi est put them. Kelk da them kred majority de them est wicked
Ili neniam harm vi beyond insult vi! Ili batal vi ili turn around flee! Ili neniam win

Ili humiliated whenever vi renkont them ili uphold di covenant tro their pac covenants vi! Ili incurred wrath DI consequently ili committed disgrace This because ili rejected di revelations killed prophets unjustly! This ili disobeyed transgressed
Ili ne est all des sam; followers scripture tie est those est righteous. Ili recite di revelations nokt ili fal prostrate
Ili kred en DI Last Tag ili advokat righteousness forbid evil ili hasten do righteous works These est des righteous
Any bon ili ne ir unrewarded. DI est fully aware da DES righteous
Those disbelieved neniam help their mon their infan DI. Ili incurred Infer wherein ili abide forever
Ekzempl their accomplishments en this life est violent vent hits rikolt popol wronged their anim visx gxi out! DI NENIAM wronged them; est ILI wronged
O vi kred ne befriend outsiders neniam cxes wish vi harm ili ecx wish seg vi sufer! Hatred flu their busx ki ili kasx en their kest est far mav Ni tiel clarify revelations vi se vi kompren

Here vi est am them while ili ne am vi vi kred en all scripture! When ili meet vi ili dir Ni kred as baldaux as ili las ili mord their fingr rage vi. dir Mort your rage DI est fully aware da innermost thoughts
When anything bon ven your voj ili dolor when io mav okaz vi ili gxoj. Vi steadfastly persevere argument righteousness their schemes neniam dolor vi! DI EST fully aware da CXIO ILI do
Recall vi (Muhammad) est your popol when vi set out asign believers their pozici por battle DI est Hearer Omniscient
grup vi preskaux failed DI est their Lord En DI believers fid
DI granted VI victory Badr your weakness. Do vi observ DI montr your appreciation
Vi told believers Est gxi ne suficx ke your Lord supports vi 3000 angxel send down
Ja vi steadfastly persevere argument righteousness tiam ili atak vi suddenly your Lord support vi 5000 angxel put dres
DI TIEL INFORM VI en ord DON VI BON news assure your kor Victory ven nur el DI Almighty Sagx
Li tiel annihilates kelk disbelievers neutralizes them; ili cxiam end losers
Est up al vi; Li redeem them Li pun them por their transgressions
Al DI aparten cxio heavens ter! Li forgives whomever Li vol pun whomever Li vol! DI est Forgiver Merciful
O vi kred vi ne pren usury compounded over kaj over Observ DI ke vi sukces
Beware da hellfire awaits disbelievers
Vi obe DI messenger ke vi ating mercy
Vi eagerly race forgiveness your Lord Paradise whose width encompasses heavens ter; gxi awaits des righteous
who don charity bon temp, tro mav temp. Ili est suppressors anger pardoners popol. DI AM DES charitable
Ili fal pek wrong their anim ili memor DI pet forgiveness their pek! - who forgives pek escept DI! - Ili ne persist en pek knowingly
Their recompense est forgiveness their Lord gxarden flu streams ili abide therein forever Ki ben rekompenc workers
Precedents set vi en des preter; roam ter not consequences unbelievers
This est proclamation popol guidance enlightenment por des righteous
Vi ne waver nor shall vi grieve vi est ultimate victors vi est believers
Vi sufer hardship enemy ankaux sufer sam hardship. Ni altern tag victory kaj defeat among des popol! DI TIEL DISTING PRAV believers BEN kelk da VI martyrdom! DI dislikes injustice
DI TIEL toughens those kred humiliates disbelievers
Vi expect enter Paradise DI disting those among vi who strive sen disting those est steadfast
Vi uz long death vi vizagx gxi! Tuj vi vizagx gxi dekstr your okul
Muhammad est ne plur than messenger messengers him. Li mort Should get killed vi turn your kalkan? Anyone turn his kalkan ne dolor DI en des malplej DI REKOMPENC those est appreciative
Ne 1 mort di las je predetermined temp Whoever streb vanities this mond ni don him therefrom whoever streb rekompenc Hereafter ni ben him therein! Ni rekompenc those est appreciative
Many prophet hav godly popol batal him sen ever wavering pressure ig de DI nor did ili hezit igx discouraged DI AM DES steadfast
Their nur utterance est Our Lord forgive us our pek our transgressions strengthen our foothold grant us victory disbelievers
Consequently DI granted them rekompenc this mond bon rekompenc de Hereafter DI AM BON doers
O vi kred vi obe those disbelieve ili turn vi sur your kalkan tiam vi end losers
DI SOL est your Lord MASTR LI est PUT supporter
Ni jxet terror kor de those disbelieved ekde ili set DI powerless idols. Their destiny est Infer; ki miserable abode transgressors

DI fulfilled His PROMES VI VI defeated them His LAS! Tiam vi wavered disput yourselves disobeyed post Li montr vi (victory) vi long por! Tiam kelk da vi igx distr spoils this mond while others rightly koncern Hereafter Li tiam diverted vi them test vi! Li pardon vi. DI DUSX believers His grace

Recall ti vi rushed spoils pag ne attention al anyone eben when messenger vok el vi! Consequently Li substituted 1 mizer another vi ne grieve anything vi missed agonize any hardship vi sufer! DI est Cognizant DE CXIO VI do

Post setback Li send vi peaceful dorm pacified kelk da vi. Others vi selfishly koncern themselves. Ili harbored thoughts DI est dekstr - Sam thoughts ili harbored tag ignorance. Tiel ili dir Est anything up al us? Dir Cxio est up al DI. Ili concealed inside ki ili ne reveal vi! Ili dir gxi est up al us neniom da us killed en this battle Dir Hav vi rest your hejm those destin killed ramp their death lit. DI tiel puts vi test bring out your prav convictions test ki est your kor! DI est fully aware da innermost thoughts
Surely those among vi torn tag 2 arme clashed duped diabl! This reflects kelk da evil works ili committed DI PARDON them. DI est Forgiver Clement

O vi kred ne est those disbelieved dir de their kinsmen vojagx mobilized milit Hav ili rest us ili ne mort gotten killed DI renders this source grief their kor! DI controls life death. DI est Seer DE CXIO VI do
Vi get killed mort ig DI forgiveness el DI mercy est far put than anything ili hoard
Vi mort get killed vi summoned DI

est mercy DI vi igx compassionate towards them. Hav vi est harsh mean-hearted ili abandoned vi! Do vi pardon them pet forgiveness them konsult them! Once vi far decision port your plan fid DI! DI AM those FID Him
Di supports vi neniom defeat vi. Kaj se Li abandons vi who support vi? En DI believers fid

Eben prophet ne pren plur de spoils milit than li entitled Anyone pren plur than his rightful akci hav kont por gxi Tag Resurrection! Est when each anim est pag por whatever gxi earned malplej injustice
Unu pursues di plezur sam as unu est incurs wrath DI his destiny est Infer plej miserable abode
Ili certainly okup different rang DI. DI est Seer DE CXIO ILI do
DI BEN believers raising their midst messenger them recite them His revelations purify them INSTRU them scripture wisdom! Antaux this ili ir totally astray
Tuj vi sufer setback ecx vi inflicted twice as mult sufer (upon your enemy vi dir did this okaz us? Dir This est consequence de your own deeds. DI est Omnipotent)
Ki aflikt vi tag 2 arme clashed est en accordance kun di testament disting believers

Al expose hypocrites told Ven batal ig DI kontribu Ili dir ni kon kiel batal ni joined vi. Ili est closer al disbelief tiam than ili est belief! Ili uttered their busx ki ne est their kor! DI kon ki ILI conceal
Ili dir de their kinsmen as ili rest behind Hav ili obe us ili ne killed Dir Tiam prevent your own death vi est truthful
Ne opini those killed ig DI est dead ili est alive their Lord gxu His provisions
Ili gxoj di grace ili hav bon news their kamarad did ne mort them ke ili hav nothing tim nor vol ili grieve
Ili hav bon news di blessings kaj grace kaj ti DI neniam fails rekompenc believers
those respond al DI messenger persecution ili sufer argument their bon works plumb righteous life great rekompenc
When popol dir al them Popol mobilized vi; vi tim them this nur strengthens their faith ili dir DI suffices us; Li est put Protector
Ili ind di blessings grace ne harm ever tusx them ili ating di approval DI POSED infinite grace
est diabl sistem instill tim his subjekt. Ne tim them tim Me instead se vi est believers
Ne saddened those hasten disbelieve! Ili neniam dolor DI en des malplej Instead DI hav willed ke ili ne hav akci Hereafter Ili incurred terrible retribution
Those choose disbelief belief ne dolor DI en des malplej ili incurred painful retribution
Let ne disbelievers opini ni plumb them por their own bon Ni nur plumb them sur konfirm their sinfulness! Ili incurred humiliating retribution

DI NE est LAS believers VI EST SEN DISTING MAV EL bon Nor does DI inform vi de future DI bestows such knowledge whomever Li chooses His messengers! Do vi kred en DI His messengers. Vi kred plumb righteous life vi ricev great recompense

Let ne those withhold hoard di provisions opini this est bon them; gxi est mav por them! Por ili port their hoarding their kol Tag Resurrection. DI est ultimate inheritor DE heavens TER. DI EST fully Cognizant DE CXIO VI do
DI auxd utterances those DIR DI est poor while NI est RICX. NI record CXIO ILI DIR just as NI recorded their killing prophets unjustly NI DIR SUFER retribution INFER
This est consequence your own works DI est neniam unjust towards popol

est ili dir DI far covenant us ke ni ne kred en any messenger li produkt ofert ke gets konsum fajr. Dir Messengers me ven al vi klar proofs including ki vi just postul! Why tiam vi kill them vi did est truthful
Ili reject vi messengers vi rejected eben ili brought proofs Psalm enlightening scripture
Cxiu ul gust death tiam vi ricev your recompense Tag Resurrection! Whoever misses Infer barely far gxi Paradise ating great triumf! life this mond est ne plur than iluzi
Vi certainly tested your mon your viv vi auxd el those ricev scripture el idol worshipers a lot de insult! Vi steadfastly persevere plumb righteous life this pruv strength your faith
DI PREN covenant EL those RICEV scripture VI PROKLAM GXI POPOL NENIAM conceal gxi, ILI disregarded GXI their DORS meti gxi FOR cheap PREZ. Ki miserable komerc
Those who fanfaron their works wish lauxd io ili really ne done ne opini ili evade retribution. Ili incurred painful retribution
Al DI aparten sovereignty de heavens ter! DI est Omnipotent
En creation de heavens ter alternation nokt tag tie est sign those posed intelligence
Ili memor DI while bud sid their flank ili reflect creation heavens ter Our Lord Vi ne kre all this en vain Vi glor. Sav us el retribution Infer
Our Lord whomever Vi commit al Infer est des unu Vi forsaken Such transgressors ne hav helpers
Our Lord ni auxd caller vok al faith proklam ‘Vi kred en your Lord ' ni kred! Our Lord forgive us our transgressions remit our pek mort righteous believers
Our Lord dusx us blessings vi promes us Your messengers ne forsake us Tag Resurrection! Vi neniam romp promes

Their Lord respond them mi neniam fail rekompenc any worker vi any work vi est vi vir female - Vi est egal al unu another Tiel those immigrate evicted their hejm persekut Me batal get killed mi surely remit their pek admit them into gxarden flu streams Such est rekompenc DI! DI POSED ultimate REKOMPENC
Ne impon apparent success disbelievers
Ili nur gxu temporarily tiam end Infer; ki miserable destiny
As por those observ their Lord ili ind gxarden flu streams ili abide therein forever Such est abode don al them DI! Ki DI posed est far put por des righteous

Surely kelk followers previous scriptures kred en DI en ki revealed vi en ki revealed them! Ili reverence DI ili neniam meti for di revelations por cheap prez. These ricev their recompense their Lord DI EST PLEJ efficient EN reckoning
O vi kred vi est steadfast vi persevere vi united vi observ DI ke vi sukces
